content: शाक्त {%<ab>a.</ab>%} क्ती {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [शक्तिर्देवताऽस्य अण्.] {@--1@} Relating to power. {@--2@} Relating to Śakti or the female personification of divine energy --क्तः A worshipper of Śakti; (the {%Śāktas%} are generally worshippers of Durgā representing the female personification of divine energy, and the ritual enjoined to them is of two kinds, the pure or right-hand ritual दक्षिणाचार, and impure or left-hand ritual वामाचार q. <ab>q. v.</ab> v.).
